body: This is fine for this commit, but this won't scale well since everything that is templated has to be included everywhere. We probably need to add an optional `- implementation_header:` attribute that gets included only in the derived Type file when that template is actually being used in a file.

We probably need to add an optional - implementation_header: attribute that gets included only in the derived Type file when that template is actually being used in a file.
